title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport
description: The 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport is the perfect entry into the world of sports cars. Featuring a 2.0L Skyactiv-G engine, the Sport trim offers exceptional handling and a thrilling driving experience. The interior is designed for driving enthusiasts with manual air conditioning, a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system, and Bluetooth connectivity. Its classic roadster design and precise handling make it a favorite for both new and seasoned drivers.
meta_title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport - Pure Driving Joy
meta_description: Discover the 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport with a 2.0L engine, 6-speed manual transmission, and classic roadster design. A perfect blend of performance and excitement.

title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Club
description: The 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Club offers a step up in performance and features from the Sport trim. With a 2.0L Skyactiv-G engine, Bilstein shocks, and a limited-slip rear differential, the Club trim is designed for those who demand a bit more from their sports car. The interior features Recaro sport seats, a 9-speaker Bose audio system, and a rear lip spoiler. The Club trim is perfect for enthusiasts seeking a balance of everyday usability and spirited driving.
key_features: Recaro sport seats and Bose audio system
meta_title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Club - Performance and Thrills
meta_description: Experience the 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Club with a 2.0L engine, Bilstein shocks, and Recaro sport seats. A high-performance roadster for those who seek a thrilling drive.

title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Grand Touring
description: The 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Grand Touring is the ultimate expression of the MX-5 series. With a 2.0L Skyactiv-G engine and a host of luxury features, this trim combines performance with comfort. Features include leather-trimmed seats, a power retractable hardtop, and a 9-speaker Bose audio system. The Grand Touring trim is perfect for those who want a premium sports car experience with all the bells and whistles.
meta_title: 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Grand Touring - Ultimate Roadster Experience
meta_description: Explore the 2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Grand Touring with a 2.0L engine, power retractable hardtop, and leather-trimmed seats. The ultimate in performance and luxury for sports car enthusiasts.
